translations: 有硬皮地；恶意地；粗暴地

sentences.sentence: "There was nothing to prevent thee," he answered crustily.
sentences.translation: “没有什么能阻止你。” 他坚定地回答。

sentences.sentence: I only horizontal under a heart, crustily skin of head.
sentences.translation: 我只有横下一条心，硬着头皮上了。

sentences.sentence: Crustily skin of head to do something, often made yourself.
sentences.translation: 硬着头皮去做某事，往往成就了你自己。
